llm_command:
kubectl apply -n frontend -f - <<EOF
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: frontend-allow-adservice
  namespace: frontend
spec:
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      app: frontend
  ingress:
  - from:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: adservice
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 9555
EOF

apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1

  name: frontend-allow-adservice
  namespace: default
spec:
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      app: frontend

  - from:

    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 9555
EOF
